title: 怎樣可以開mincraft server 1.3.2
author: kennetho
txt_content: 我開了mincraft server 1.3.2  可是沒有 forge .我想要1個minecraft server withe forge (mod:clay solider 1.3.2).我要怎樣做就可以玩到多人?T^T我試了很多次了

replies.author: aa210063654
replies.txt_content:
可以裝Mod的Bukkit停留在125了(Google下Mcpc咯
如果是官方的Server,就可以裝Forge,但是沒有插件,看取舍咯
現在也發現官方的Server+Forge+基於Forge的Login插件

replies.author: kennetho
replies.txt_content: 我有forge 又有minecraft server 1.3.2 當我把forge放進server之後就打不開了

replies.author: kennetho
replies.txt_content: minecraft server 1.3.2 左這論壇download的. clay soldier  1.3.2 能用.  forge不能用了

replies.author: kennetho
replies.txt_content: 救大大幫幫忙解決我的問題T^T
